sqlMap.select: select pid, name, isIndustry, continuedmonth, price, rightpaths, description, url from product where pid = #pid:INTEGER#

sqlMap.update:
update product
name = #name:VARCHAR#
isIndustry = #isIndustry:TINYINT#
continuedmonth = #continuedmonth:INTEGER#
price = #price:REAL#
rightpaths = #rightpaths:VARCHAR#
description = #description:LONGVARCHAR#
where pid = #pid:INTEGER#
